title: Datasets
text: Cumulative odometer mileage quantiles used vehicles 3-month age bins, computed vehicle listings data. used vehicles valid mileage age 15 years (180 months) included. Quantiles provided 25th, 50th, 75th percentiles across various groupings powertrain vehicle type.

title: Datasets
text: Daily VMT quantiles used vehicles, computed total odometer miles divided vehicle age days. used vehicles valid mileage age 15 years included. Percentile quantiles 1st 99th provided across various groupings powertrain vehicle type.
code: head(vmt_daily, 10) #>    powertrain vehicle_type quantile     miles #> 1         All          All        1  2.719209 #> 2         All          All        2  4.637514 #> 3         All          All        3  6.048788 #> 4         All          All        4  7.249902 #> 5         All          All        5  8.233122 #> 6         All          All        6  9.068620 #> 7         All          All        7  9.872219 #> 8         All          All        8 10.630848 #> 9         All          All        9 11.298499 #> 10        All          All       10 11.929582

title: Datasets
text: Estimated annual vehicle miles traveled combination powertrain vehicle type. Computed fitting OLS regressions total odometer miles vehicle age (years) used vehicle listings; slope coefficient represents estimated annual VMT.
code: head(vmt_annual_type, 10) #>                powertrain vehicle_type vmt_annual #> 1  Battery Electric (BEV)          CUV   9805.068 #> 2  Battery Electric (BEV)          Car   6710.569 #> 3  Battery Electric (BEV)      Minivan   5523.487 #> 4  Battery Electric (BEV)       Pickup   9538.308 #> 5  Battery Electric (BEV)          SUV   7433.105 #> 6                  Diesel          CUV  10124.972 #> 7                  Diesel          Car  10112.002 #> 8                  Diesel      Minivan   4841.334 #> 9                  Diesel       Pickup  12466.379 #> 10                 Diesel          SUV  10947.811

title: Datasets
text: Estimated annual vehicle miles traveled individual vehicle make/model combinations. Computed fitting OLS regressions total odometer miles vehicle age (years) used vehicle listings; slope coefficient represents estimated annual VMT. make/model combinations least 100 listings included, results filtered positive annual VMT values .
code: head(vmt_annual_model, 10) #>          make               model                     powertrain vehicle_type #> 1       Acura                 MDX                       Gasoline          CUV #> 2       Acura                 RDX                       Gasoline          CUV #> 3       Acura                  TL                       Gasoline          Car #> 4       Acura                 TLX                       Gasoline          Car #> 5  Alfa Romeo              Tonale Plug-In Hybrid Electric (PHEV)          CUV #> 6        Audi                  A3                         Diesel          Car #> 7        Audi            A3 Sedan                         Diesel          Car #> 8        Audi A3 Sportback e-tron Plug-In Hybrid Electric (PHEV)          Car #> 9        Audi                  A4                Flex Fuel (E85)          Car #> 10       Audi                  A4                       Gasoline          Car #>    vmt_annual #> 1   11334.421 #> 2   10640.250 #> 3    8155.315 #> 4   11107.978 #> 5    7538.852 #> 6    8582.209 #> 7   10542.387 #> 8    8538.215 #> 9    9182.230 #> 10   9070.911

title: Datasets
text: Retention rate (price / MSRP) quantiles used vehicles, computed 3-month age bins vehicle listings data. used vehicles valid price MSRP values included, ages ranging 12 180 months (15 years). Quantiles provided 25th, 50th, 75th percentiles across various groupings powertrain vehicle type.

title: Datasets
text: Estimated annual depreciation rate combination powertrain vehicle type. Computed fitting log-linear regressions retention rate (price / MSRP) vehicle age (years) used vehicle listings; annual depreciation rate 1 - exp(b) b age coefficient. used vehicles aged 1–10 years valid price MSRP values included.
code: head(dep_annual_type, 10) #>                powertrain vehicle_type dep_annual #> 1  Battery Electric (BEV)          CUV 0.10402026 #> 2  Battery Electric (BEV)          Car 0.10233225 #> 3  Battery Electric (BEV)      Minivan 0.06215965 #> 4  Battery Electric (BEV)       Pickup 0.05573484 #> 5  Battery Electric (BEV)          SUV 0.02428713 #> 6         Flex Fuel (E85)          CUV 0.06586182 #> 7         Flex Fuel (E85)          Car 0.05712966 #> 8         Flex Fuel (E85)      Minivan 0.07188022 #> 9         Flex Fuel (E85)       Pickup 0.04602709 #> 10        Flex Fuel (E85)          SUV 0.09711303

title: Datasets
text: Estimated annual depreciation rate individual vehicle make/model combinations. Computed fitting log-linear regressions retention rate (price / MSRP) vehicle age (years) used vehicle listings; annual depreciation rate 1 - exp(b) b age coefficient. used vehicles aged 1–10 years valid price MSRP values included. make/model combinations least 100 listings included, results filtered positive depreciation rates .
code: head(dep_annual_model, 10) #>     make        model      powertrain vehicle_type dep_annual #> 1  Acura          MDX        Gasoline          CUV 0.11083871 #> 2  Acura          RDX        Gasoline          CUV 0.09383736 #> 3  Acura           TL        Gasoline          Car 0.07885553 #> 4  Acura          TLX        Gasoline          Car 0.07452962 #> 5   Audi           A4 Flex Fuel (E85)          Car 0.07030819 #> 6   Audi           A4        Gasoline          Car 0.09650968 #> 7   Audi           A5 Flex Fuel (E85)          Car 0.05352090 #> 8   Audi A5 Cabriolet Flex Fuel (E85)          Car 0.07388719 #> 9   Audi     A5 Coupe Flex Fuel (E85)          Car 0.07335039 #> 10  Audi      Allroad Flex Fuel (E85)          Car 0.08773891

title: Datasets
text: Market share (proportion) vehicle listings combination two grouping variables, computed across listing years inventory types. Six variable-pair combinations included: powertrain vehicle type, powertrain price bin, vehicle type powertrain, vehicle type price bin, price bin powertrain, price bin vehicle type.
code: head(percent_market, 10) #>    listing_year inventory_type  group_var            group_level category_var #> 1          2019            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 2          2020            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 3          2021            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 4          2018            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 5          2018            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 6          2021            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 7          2020            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 8          2019            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 9          2022            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 10         2024            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #>    category_level     n           p #> 1             Car 32849 0.809427593 #> 2             Car 27343 0.683028577 #> 3             Car 38370 0.398029046 #> 4             Car 30747 0.992991862 #> 5         Minivan    31 0.001001163 #> 6             CUV 58030 0.601970954 #> 7             CUV 12689 0.316971423 #> 8             CUV  7733 0.190547766 #> 9          Pickup  7685 0.043135384 #> 10         Pickup 38112 0.073538237

title: Datasets
text: Percentage dealers least one listing combination two grouping variables, computed across listing years inventory types. Three variable-pair combinations included: powertrain vehicle type, powertrain price bin, vehicle type price bin.
code: head(percent_dealers, 10) #>    listing_year inventory_type  group_var            group_level category_var #> 1          2019            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 2          2020            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 3          2021            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 4          2018            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 5          2018            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 6          2021            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 7          2020            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 8          2019            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 9          2022            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #> 10         2024            New powertrain Battery Electric (BEV) vehicle_type #>    category_level           p #> 1             Car 0.146704506 #> 2             Car 0.158801921 #> 3             Car 0.191919192 #> 4             Car 0.151886245 #> 5         Minivan 0.001160766 #> 6             CUV 0.318823595 #> 7             CUV 0.064255439 #> 8             CUV 0.054558091 #> 9          Pickup 0.110011107 #> 10         Pickup 0.215214411

title: Datasets
text: Annual vehicle registration counts US state powertrain type, scraped Alternative Fuels Data Center (AFDC) years 2016 2024.
code: head(registrations, 10) #>    year   state                     powertrain   count #> 1  2016 Alabama         Battery Electric (BEV)     500 #> 2  2016 Alabama                      Biodiesel       0 #> 3  2016 Alabama   Compressed Natural Gas (CNG)   20100 #> 4  2016 Alabama                         Diesel  126500 #> 5  2016 Alabama                Flex Fuel (E85)  428300 #> 6  2016 Alabama                      Fuel Cell       0 #> 7  2016 Alabama                       Gasoline 3777300 #> 8  2016 Alabama          Hybrid Electric (HEV)   29100 #> 9  2016 Alabama                       Methanol       0 #> 10 2016 Alabama Plug-In Hybrid Electric (PHEV)     900

code: @Manual{,   title = {oica: Data on Vehicle Production and Sales from the OICA},   author = {John Paul Helveston},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.1},   url = {https://jhelvy.github.io/oica/}, }

what: Data on Vehicle Trends in the USA
title: Data on Vehicle Trends in the USA
text: R data package containing tidy formatted summary data vehicle trends United States. primary data source vehicle listings marketcheck.com, processed summary statistics including depreciation curves, mileage accumulation, market concentration, market share breakdowns. live dashboard data, visit vehicletrends.us.

title: Data on Vehicle Trends in the USA
text: can install vehicletrends GitHub:
code: # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("vehicletrends/vehicletrends")

title: Data on Vehicle Trends in the USA
text: loaded, datasets available directly name. See datasets article detailed data dictionaries.
code: library(vehicletrends)

what: Estimated annual depreciation rate by make and model — dep_annual_model
title: Estimated annual depreciation rate by make and model — dep_annual_model
text: Estimated annual depreciation rate individual vehicle make/model combinations. Computed fitting log-linear regressions retention rate (price / MSRP) vehicle age (years) used vehicle listings; annual depreciation rate 1 - exp(b) b age coefficient. used vehicles aged 1–10 years valid price MSRP values included. make/model combinations least 100 listings included, results filtered positive depreciation rates .

title: Estimated annual depreciation rate by make and model — dep_annual_model
code: data(dep_annual_model)

title: Estimated annual depreciation rate by make and model — dep_annual_model
text: data frame 5 variables:

title: Estimated annual depreciation rate by make and model — dep_annual_model
text: Computed used vehicle listings data Marketcheck.

title: Estimated annual depreciation rate by make and model — dep_annual_model
code: data(dep_annual_model)  head(dep_annual_model) #>    make model      powertrain vehicle_type dep_annual #> 1 Acura   MDX        Gasoline          CUV 0.11083871 #> 2 Acura   RDX        Gasoline          CUV 0.09383736 #> 3 Acura    TL        Gasoline          Car 0.07885553 #> 4 Acura   TLX        Gasoline          Car 0.07452962 #> 5  Audi    A4 Flex Fuel (E85)          Car 0.07030819 #> 6  Audi    A4        Gasoline          Car 0.09650968

Computed fitting log-linear regressions retention rate (price / MSRP) vehicle age (years) used vehicle listings; annual depreciation rate 1 - exp(b) b age coefficient. used vehicles aged 1–10 years valid price MSRP values included.

title: Estimated annual depreciation rate by powertrain and vehicle type — dep_annual_type
code: data(dep_annual_type)

title: Estimated annual depreciation rate by powertrain and vehicle type — dep_annual_type

code: data(dep_annual_type)  head(dep_annual_type) #>               powertrain vehicle_type dep_annual #> 1 Battery Electric (BEV)          CUV 0.10402026 #> 2 Battery Electric (BEV)          Car 0.10233225 #> 3 Battery Electric (BEV)      Minivan 0.06215965 #> 4 Battery Electric (BEV)       Pickup 0.05573484 #> 5 Battery Electric (BEV)          SUV 0.02428713 #> 6        Flex Fuel (E85)          CUV 0.06586182

what: Vehicle depreciation quantiles by age, powertrain, and vehicle type — depreciation
title: Vehicle depreciation quantiles by age, powertrain, and vehicle type — depreciation
text: Retention rate (price / MSRP) quantiles used vehicles, computed 3-month age bins vehicle listings data. used vehicles valid price MSRP values included, ages ranging 12 180 months (15 years). Quantiles provided 25th, 50th, 75th percentiles across various groupings powertrain vehicle type.

title: Vehicle depreciation quantiles by age, powertrain, and vehicle type — depreciation
code: data(depreciation)

title: Vehicle depreciation quantiles by age, powertrain, and vehicle type — depreciation
text: tibble 6,486 rows 5 variables:

title: Vehicle depreciation quantiles by age, powertrain, and vehicle type — depreciation
text: Computed used vehicle listings data Marketcheck.

title: Vehicle depreciation quantiles by age, powertrain, and vehicle type — depreciation
code: data(depreciation)  head(depreciation) #> # A tibble: 6 × 5 #>   age_bin powertrain vehicle_type quantile    rr #>     <dbl> <chr>      <chr>           <dbl> <dbl> #> 1    13.5 All        All                25 0.808 #> 2    13.5 All        All                50 0.943 #> 3    13.5 All        All                75 1.09  #> 4    16.5 All        All                25 0.760 #> 5    16.5 All        All                50 0.901 #> 6    16.5 All        All                75 1.05

what: Percentage of dealers with at least one listing by variable pairs — percent_dealers
title: Percentage of dealers with at least one listing by variable pairs — percent_dealers
text: Percentage dealers least one listing combination two grouping variables, computed across listing years inventory types. Three variable-pair combinations included: powertrain vehicle type, powertrain price bin, vehicle type price bin.

title: Percentage of dealers with at least one listing by variable pairs — percent_dealers
code: data(percent_dealers)

title: Percentage of dealers with at least one listing by variable pairs — percent_dealers
text: data frame 7 variables:

title: Percentage of dealers with at least one listing by variable pairs — percent_dealers
text: Computed vehicle listings data Marketcheck.

title: Percentage of dealers with at least one listing by variable pairs — percent_dealers
code: data(percent_dealers)  head(percent_dealers) #> # A tibble: 6 × 7 #>   listing_year inventory_type group_var  group_level category_var category_level #>          <dbl> <chr>          <chr>      <chr>       <chr>        <chr>          #> 1         2019 New            powertrain Battery El… vehicle_type Car            #> 2         2020 New            powertrain Battery El… vehicle_type Car            #> 3         2021 New            powertrain Battery El… vehicle_type Car            #> 4         2018 New            powertrain Battery El… vehicle_type Car            #> 5         2018 New            powertrain Battery El… vehicle_type Minivan        #> 6         2021 New            powertrain Battery El… vehicle_type CUV            #> # ℹ 1 more variable: p <dbl>

what: Total vehicle miles traveled quantiles by age — vmt_age
title: Total vehicle miles traveled quantiles by age — vmt_age
text: Cumulative odometer mileage quantiles used vehicles 3-month age bins, computed vehicle listings data. used vehicles valid mileage age 15 years (180 months) included. Quantiles provided 25th, 50th, 75th percentiles across various groupings powertrain vehicle type.

code: data(vmt_age)

title: Total vehicle miles traveled quantiles by age — vmt_age
